summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Ninth Avenue West, from West Prospect Street to West Lee Street; West Prospect Street, from Eighth Avenue West to Ninth Avenue West; Olympic Place, from Eighth Avenue West to Ninth Avenue West; West Highland Drive, from Eighth Avenue West to Ninth Avenue West; West Lee Street, from Eighth Avenue West to Tenth Avenue West; Tenth Avenue West, from West Lee Street to three hundred (300) feet south of the south margin of West Lee Street, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and regrading the same, and constructing concrete sidewalks thereon, in accordance with Resolution No. 720 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
